overview: Revamp the UI for devinsights.co.in in a new Next.js + Tailwind + shadcn/ui project. Keep all existing text/content the same, but redesign the layout, visual system, and components. Skip /blogs for now. Target production-grade, distinctive design (avoid generic AI aesthetics).

userStories.title: Initialize shadcn/ui, theme toggle, and base layout
acceptanceCriteria: Project uses shadcn/ui (init + components folder created)
Add light/dark theme toggle using next-themes and a small UI control in the header
Create a base layout (header/nav + footer) in App Router
No content copy from DevInsights yet; just scaffold + design tokens
Commands pass: npm run lint, npm run build

userStories.title: Implement redesigned Home page using existing DevInsights content
acceptanceCriteria: Home page (/) contains the same text sections as devinsights.co.in homepage: hero (10 years), Who we are, Impactful Solutions, Coverage stats, Focus areas, Testimonials, Resources/Working papers/video gallery section, and YouTube subscribe CTA
Presentation/layout is fully redesigned with a distinctive aesthetic direction
Use shadcn/ui primitives where appropriate (buttons, cards, tabs/accordion if useful)
Commands pass: npm run lint, npm run build

userStories.title: Add page inventory + placeholder routes for discovered key pages (skip blogs)
acceptanceCriteria: Discover and list key pages linked from home (at least: /devinsights-10-years and any core pages like about/services if present)
Create Next.js routes for those pages with placeholder shells (header/footer + page title) so we can fill later
Add a /pages.md doc listing discovered routes and whether implemented
Commands pass: npm run lint, npm run build

userStories.title: Prepare for Render native Node deploy
acceptanceCriteria: Add Render deploy notes (render.md) with build/start commands
Ensure Node version pinned via .nvmrc and package.json engines
App runs with npm start after npm run build
Commands pass: npm run lint, npm run build
